info.title: CCTV API
info.description: API to retrieve lists of CCTV cameras based on location and other parameters.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of CCTVs near a specified location.
post.description: Returns a list of CCTVs within a default range of 1km around the specified location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location to search near (e.g., '건대 입구').

200.description: A list of CCTVs near the specified location.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of CCTVs near a specified location within a specified range.
post.description: Returns a list of CCTVs within a given range around the specified location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location to search near (e.g., '건대 입구').

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range in kilometers to search within.

200.description: A list of CCTVs near the specified location within the specified range.

post.summary: Find CCTVs near a specified location where a person with certain characteristics appears.
post.description: Returns a list of CCTVs within a default range of 1km around the specified location where a person with the specified characteristics is seen.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location to search near (e.g., '건대 입구').

parameters.name: appearance
parameters.description: The description of the person to search for (e.g., '파란색 옷과 모자를 입은 아이').

200.description: A list of CCTVs near the specified location where the person with the specified characteristics appears.

get.summary: Find CCTVs near a specified location within a specified range where a person with certain characteristics appears.
get.description: Returns a list of CCTVs within the specified range around the specified location where a person with the specified characteristics is seen.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location to search near (e.g., '건대 입구').

parameters.name: appearance
parameters.description: The description of the person to search for (e.g., '파란색 옷과 모자를 입은 아이').

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range in kilometers to search within.

200.description: A list of CCTVs near the specified location within the specified range where the person with the specified characteristics appears.
